description:
ARMAF Club de Nuit Blue Iconic for Men EDP 105mL - Timeless Masculine Elegance

Experience the captivating allure of ARMAF Club de Nuit Blue Iconic, a sophisticated men's fragrance that embodies confidence and modern masculinity. This exceptional eau de parfum from Armaf's renowned Club de Nuit collection delivers an unforgettable olfactory journey that stands as a testament to refined taste. âœ¨

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
105mL Men Eau de Parfum EDP ARMAF

The Fragrance Profile of Club de Nuit Blue Iconic

Top Notes Bergamot, Lemon, Grapefruit, Marine Accord
Heart Notes Lavender, Geranium, Juniper Berries, Spicy Notes
Base Notes Amberwood, Patchouli, Vetiver, Musk

Key Features of ARMAF Club de Nuit Blue Iconic:

  • ðŸ”¥ Long-lasting performance with impressive projection and sillage
  • ðŸ’Ž Versatile scent suitable for both casual daytime wear and evening occasions
  • ðŸŒ¿ Refreshing marine accords balanced with sophisticated woody base
  • ðŸ’« Distinctive blue bottle design that embodies modern luxury
  • âœ¨ Exceptional value compared to similar premium designer fragrances

The ARMAF brand has established itself as a creator of high-quality woody fragrances that rival premium designer scents at accessible price points. The Club de Nuit collection, launched in 2015, quickly gained a devoted following for its exceptional quality and distinctive character. Blue Iconic continues this tradition, offering a fresh, marine-inspired interpretation that has become a bestseller among discerning fragrance enthusiasts.

This men's EDP opens with a burst of crisp citrus notes that gradually evolve into an aromatic heart of lavender and spicy accords. The dry down reveals a sophisticated woody base that leaves a memorable impression. Perfect for the modern gentleman who appreciates distinctive fragrances with character and staying power. Ideal for year-round wear, this new arrival is sure to become a staple in your collection. ðŸŒ¸

Frequently Asked Question:

How long does ARMAF Club de Nuit Blue Iconic last on skin?

ARMAF Club de Nuit Blue Iconic offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The high-quality EDP concentration ensures the fragrance projects strongly for the first 3-4 hours before settling into a pleasant, long-lasting skin scent. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and clothing, and consider using an unscented moisturizer beforehand to help the fragrance adhere better to your skin.
short_description: Discover ARMAF Club de Nuit Blue Iconic, a sophisticated men's EDP blending fresh marine accords with spicy aromatics and rich woody notes. This captivating 105mL fragrance delivers exceptional longevity and projection, perfect for the confident modern man seeking distinctive elegance.
